image.alt: Figueroa Orthodontics team and patients, smiling in a modern office

Home.title: Welcome to Figueroa Orthodontics in Winnetka and Naperville, IL

paragraphs.text: Thanks for visiting the website of Figueroa Orthodontics. We proudly provide the Naperville and Winnetka, IL area with friendly and family-oriented orthodontic care. Our practice offers a pleasant and relaxed atmosphere for you to receive orthodontic treatment. In addition, because we understand the importance of building trusting relationships, we spend extra time with you and your family to ensure all your questions and concerns are addressed. You’ll enjoy coming to our practice because we truly care about you, your experience, and your smile!

items.title: Personalized Care
items.text: We spend extra time building trusting relationships so patients and families feel comfortable from the first visit.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: We use iTero digital impressions, CBCT imaging, and Dental Monitoring to plan and accelerate treatment with precision and comfort.

items.title: Modern Options
items.text: From clear aligners and Damon®/Damon Clear™ braces to lingual and surgical solutions, we offer treatment options for every stage of life.

items.title: Easy New Patients
items.text: Online new patient forms, insurance and scheduling support, plus complimentary consultations make getting started simple.

paragraphs.heading: Dr. Alex Figueroa, DMD
paragraphs.text: Dr. Alex Figueroa, DMD, holds an Orthodontics Specialty Certificate and a Certificate in TMJD from the University of Rochester / Eastman Institute. He is active in craniofacial research and enjoys building one‑on‑one relationships with patients and families.

paragraphs.heading: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa
paragraphs.text: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa brings deep clinical experience and a family background in medicine and dentistry. He focuses on personalized care and long-term results for children, teens, and adults.

paragraphs.heading: Dr. Ahmed Shawky
paragraphs.text: Dr. Ahmed Shawky emphasizes patient education and strong relationships. He prioritizes clear communication so every patient understands their treatment and feels confident throughout the process.

image.alt: Dr. Alex Figueroa headshot

paragraphs.text: From clear aligners to surgical orthodontics, we offer modern treatment options tailored to each patient.

testimonials.author: Ellen
testimonials.testimonial: “After seeing the fantastic results my sister (an adult patient) achieved, I decided to have a consultation with Dr. Figueroa. He clearly explained the process and I am now the proud owner of a beautiful smile.”

testimonials.author: Andrea
testimonials.testimonial: “As an adult patient I was worried about how I would look with braces. Dr. Figueroa assured me it would be worth it and he was right. I don't regret a day wearing braces and he was extremely supportive throughout my treatment.”

testimonials.author: Julie
testimonials.testimonial: “We were overwhelmed when we first came to Dr. Al several years ago. My daughter had an underbite that braces alone couldn’t fix. Dr. Al came up with a comprehensive plan... Now, my daughter is off at college with a normal bite and a BEAUTIFUL smile!”

testimonials.author: Scott
testimonials.testimonial: “Our kids love Figueroa Orthodontics. We appreciate the treatment plan, knowing exactly what to expect, along with genuine friendliness...”

og_meta.title: Home - Figueroa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Family-oriented orthodontic care in Winnetka and Naperville, IL. Learn about clear aligners, Damon® braces, surgical orthodontics, and our doctors.

image.alt: Interior view of Figueroa Orthodontics, bright modern reception and treatment area

paragraphs.text: Our caring doctors and the exceptional team are what sets Figueroa Orthodontics apart. We are a friendly family practice with a focus on excellence and detail and our doctors and staff are eager and available to answer your questions. In addition to achieving a fantastic smile, what we find most rewarding is getting to know you and your family.

Figueroa Orthodontics provides state-of-the-art orthodontic treatments tailored to each patient. We offer the Damon System (including Damon Clear), Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> Teen, Accelerated Orthodontics, custom lingual braces, and specialized nasoalveolar molding and craniofacial care when needed.

Our practice uses advanced tools like 3D digital radiography, iTero digital impressions, Dental Monitoring, and a paperless, Apple-based workflow to make treatment more predictable, comfortable, and convenient.
Above all, we focus on personalized care: clear communication, gentle techniques, and flexible scheduling so every patient leaves with a healthy, confident smile and a positive experience.

image.alt: Dr. Alex Figueroa headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Alex Figueroa finds the best part of orthodontics is building relationships with patients and their families. He approaches each case with attention to detail and a commitment to delivering predictable, comfortable treatment tailored to each patient's needs.

Dr. Figueroa is actively involved in orthodontic and craniofacial research as part of the Craniofacial Team at Rush University Medical Center. He presents at professional meetings and pursues continuing education to stay current with advanced techniques.

Outside the office he enjoys time with his wife Jessica, their sons Eddie and Sammy, and outdoor activities such as biking, golfing, and skiing. He also enjoys exploring Chicago's lakefront and dining scene.

image.alt: Dr. Alex Figueroa smiling

paragraphs.text: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa grew up in a family of physicians and dentists and brings a deep sense of service to his specialty. He values helping patients gain confidence through healthy, functional smiles and provides compassionate care for complex needs.

Dr. Alvaro is an integral member of several craniofacial teams across Chicago and the suburbs. He regularly treats infants with cleft lip and palate, coordinates surgical cases, and works with a broad network of dental and medical specialists for patients with craniofacial anomalies.
He balances a busy clinical life with community involvement and looks forward to giving back through clinical service and education.

image.alt: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Ahmed Shawky enjoys connecting with patients and their families and places a strong emphasis on patient education so everyone understands the 'why' behind treatment decisions. He brings a thoughtful, evidence-based approach to orthodontic care.

Education and credentials: University of Minnesota, Doctor of Dental Surgery (DDS) 2021; Biomedical Engineering BS and MS; Orthodontics Specialty Certificate and Master of Science from Marquette University (MS 2024). He is a member of professional organizations including the AAO, MSO, and ADA.
Outside the office Dr. Shawky enjoys running, cycling, cooking, and community education work, including teaching Arabic. He values teamwork, continuing education, and compassionate patient care.

image.alt: Dr. Ahmed Shawky headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa provides specialized care for patients with craniofacial differences and infants born with cleft lip and palate. As a core member of multiple craniofacial teams, he coordinates interdisciplinary care, works closely with surgical partners, and offers compassionate treatment for complex cases and special needs patients.

image.alt: Dr. Alvaro Figueroa smiling

paragraphs.text: Dr. Ahmed Shawky emphasizes clear education and collaborative care. He completed his DDS at the University of Minnesota (2021), holds BS and MS degrees in Biomedical Engineering, and earned his Orthodontics Specialty Certificate and MS from Marquette University (MS 2024). Dr. Shawky is committed to modern, evidence-based orthodontics and is active in professional organizations.
Outside of practice he enjoys running, cycling, cooking, and community education projects, including language instruction. He brings energy and a patient-centered focus to every treatment plan.

image.alt: Dr. Ahmed Shawky headshot
Patients and family in the Figueroa Orthodontics office

og_meta.title: About Us | Figueroa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Meet the Figueroa Orthodontics team serving Naperville and Winnetka with modern orthodontic care and individualized treatment options.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit begins with a consultation where the doctor will review your concerns, take records, and recommend a treatment plan. The initial consultation and records, including photos and scans, give us the information needed to diagnose and plan treatment.

At your appointment we will check you in and complete or confirm new-patient paperwork, conduct a brief medical and health screening with any supplemental consent, take preliminary diagnostic records such as photos and impressions or scans if needed, and review a personalized plan with the doctor including timeline and appliance options.

Please bring completed new patient forms if you printed them, or be prepared to complete forms online before arrival; bring insurance card(s) and photo ID if applicable, and any recent dental x-rays or the name of your dentist so we can request records. For safety, please brush and floss before your visit; you may receive a supplemental health or COVID questionnaire by text before arrival and follow current screening procedures as required.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: Multiple financing options are available to help fit treatment into your family budget.

We offer a complimentary orthodontic consultation; contact us to schedule your free consultation. For details about payment methods, insurance providers accepted, and plan-specific coverage, please contact the office so our staff can verify plan acceptance and review payment options with you.
Please complete the online new patient form before your first appointment when possible. If you prefer, print and bring the completed PDF to your visit.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online
Patients and family in the Figueroa Orthodontics office

og_meta.title: Get Started | Figueroa Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn what to expect at your first visit to Figueroa Orthodontics. Access new patient forms, payment options, and schedule your free consultation.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at the clinic

paragraphs.text: Early (Phase One) orthodontic care identifies growth and alignment issues while a child’s mouth is still developing, allowing simpler, gentler treatment that can reduce the need for more invasive care later.
We typically evaluate children around ages 6–8. If records show jaw discrepancies, crowding, or bite problems, early appliances and monitoring begin after an initial consultation.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic intervention

paragraphs.text: Early treatment can guide jaw growth, resolve crossbites, address severe crowding that might otherwise need extractions, and improve eruption paths for permanent teeth.

image.alt: Orthodontic evaluation of a young patient

paragraphs.text: Phase One uses early appliances as needed, followed by a resting period while permanent teeth erupt, then Phase Two with full braces when appropriate. This staged approach often shortens later treatment.

image.alt: Family smiling after early orthodontic care
Smiling family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: Adults seeking straighter teeth often choose treatment for health, function, or confidence. Modern options are discreet and designed to fit busy schedules and existing dental work.

image.alt: Adult orthodontic patient smiling

paragraphs.text: Metal braces remain a durable, cost-effective solution that uses brackets and wires to move teeth predictably. Regular adjustments guide teeth into their final positions.

image.alt: Dental checkup with metal braces

paragraphs.text: Ceramic or clear braces blend with your tooth color for a less noticeable appearance while still delivering effective results.

image.alt: Patient smiling with ceramic braces
Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Clear aligners use a series of custom, removable trays to move teeth. Digital scans and 3D planning let us tailor the treatment and show expected stages of movement.
Aligners are discreet, removable for eating and cleaning, and can be paired with remote tools like Dental Monitoring to reduce in-office visits.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: When significant skeletal jaw discrepancies exist, orthodontic care may be combined with orthognathic surgery. We coordinate closely with oral and maxillofacial surgeons for planning and recovery.
The process includes pre-surgical orthodontic preparation, surgery with specialist partners, and post-surgical finishing to achieve functional and esthetic outcomes.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient receiving surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: Retainers preserve the results of active treatment. We offer removable clear retainers, traditional Hawley options, and bonded fixed retainers depending on case needs.
Typical protocols begin with full-time wear, then transition to nights only. Good hygiene and adherence to instructions help ensure long-term stability.

image.alt: Young woman holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: We use modern digital tools—3D scanning, iTero impressions, digital X-rays, and 3D treatment planning—to improve precision, comfort, and predictability across treatments.
Fast, radiation-free scans capture accurate 3D images that streamline planning and fit for aligners and appliances.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in use during consultation

paragraphs.text: High-resolution digital radiography provides detailed images with lower radiation and improved diagnostic clarity for planning complex cases.

image.alt: Digital X-ray equipment used in orthodontic imaging

paragraphs.text: Simulation software visualizes tooth movement and surgical outcomes, helping you understand the process and expected stages before treatment begins.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation
Modern dentist office interior with advanced technology
Patients and family in the Figueroa Orthodontics office

og_meta.title: Contact Figueroa Orthodontics | Naperville & Winnetka Orthodontist
og_meta.description: Contact Figueroa Orthodontics in Naperville or Winnetka to request an appointment, ask questions, or get directions. Friendly staff and convenient scheduling.

image.alt: Interior view of orthodontic practice, patient forms and welcoming reception

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about treatment options, appointment scheduling, insurance and payment choices, daily care, and emergency guidance at Figueroa Orthodontics.

accordion.header: What treatment options do you offer?

paragraphs.text: We offer a range of options including clear aligners such as Spark and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, Damon® self‑ligating braces including Damon Clear, lingual braces, traditional metal braces, and specialty care for craniofacial or surgical cases when needed. See our treatment pages for short feature lists and details on each option.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners on model teeth

accordion.header: How long will treatment take and what affects the timeline?

paragraphs.text: Treatment time depends on the complexity of the case, the appliance chosen, patient growth for children, and how closely patients follow instructions such as wearing elastics or aligners. We explain two‑phase treatment and provide a personalized timeline during your initial evaluation.

image.alt: Appointment request page hero image showing warm clinic interior

accordion.header: How do Damon braces differ from traditional braces?

paragraphs.text: The Damon System uses self‑ligating, tie‑less brackets that can reduce friction and allow gentler forces. That can mean fewer adjustments for some patients and improved comfort. We outline benefits and treatment expectations on our Damon System page.

image.alt: Close-up of Damon braces on model teeth

accordion.header: Do you accept insurance and what are my payment options?

paragraphs.text: We will submit claims to your carrier on your behalf and explain coverage after contacting the insurer. Payment options include major credit cards, cash or check, in‑office no‑interest plans, CareCredit third‑party financing, and low or zero down options for many treatments. Printable forms and the online intake are available below.

image.alt: Retainer care instructions visual

accordion.header: How do I schedule or request an appointment?

paragraphs.text: Use our Request an Appointment page to send preferred dates, times, and contact information. If you need to cancel, reschedule, or require urgent attention, contact the office directly. Appointment request page: https://figueroaorthodontics.com/request-an-appointment/

image.alt: Request an appointment hero image showing clinic interior

accordion.header: What should I do for day-to-day care while in treatment?

paragraphs.text: Brush and floss after every meal while in treatment. Use a soft‑bristled or powered toothbrush at a 45 degree angle to the gumline, and use a floss threader or orthodontic floss. Keep retainers away from heat, store them in their case, and clean with mild soap or denture cleaner. See our Brushing & Flossing and Retainer Instructions pages for full guidance.

image.alt: Animated demonstration of orthodontic brushing technique

accordion.header: What do I do in an orthodontic emergency?

paragraphs.text: For appliance issues such as a poking wire or loose band, try short‑term home remedies like orthodontic wax or tucking the wire under the arch and call to schedule a repair. For knocked‑out or displaced teeth, contact your family dentist first. After office hours, call the emergency line at 630-442-0006 for urgent pain or injuries.

image.alt: Emergency care visual for orthodontic injuries
Patients and family in the Figueroa Orthodontics office
